name: Real-Time Metrics
description: Real-Time Metrics is an Observe product that provides you with real-time access to metrics so you can optimize all of your potential through our platform.

name: Real-Time Events
description: Real-Time Events is an Observe module that allows you to display data from your Azion Products and Services in real time. You can use Real-Time Events to perform complex searches and explore data from your Azion applications.

name: Applications
description: Edge Application is a tool that lets you build web applications on the edge network, reducing latency and throughput between origin servers and users.

name: Real-Time Purge
description: Through Real-Time Purge you can instantly delete the cache of your content at Azion, using a Cache Key List, a URL List or a Wildcard expression that represents the objects you want to purge.
